item.title: Linux 系统中安装 Gitea
item.description: 创建数据库 1 mysql -u root -p 1 2 3 4 5 CREATE USER 'gitea' IDENTIFIED BY '密码'; CREATE DATABASE gitea CHARACTER SET 'utf8mb4' COLLATE 'utf8mb4_unicode_ci'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON gitea.* TO 'gitea'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES; EXIT 创建工作路径，下载 Gitea，安装 Git，创建 git 用户 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/gitea/{bin,conf,custom,data,log} sudo wget -O /usr/local/gitea/bin/gitea https://dl.gitea.com/gitea/1.21.0/gitea-1.21.0-linux-amd64 sudo chmod +x /usr/local/gitea/bin/gitea sudo dnf install -y git sudo useradd git sudo chown -R git:git /usr/local/gitea sudo chmod -R 750 /usr/local/gitea 创建 Gitea 服务
